about_me_content: My name is Guylian Gilsing. I'm an enthousiastic student that has an interest in beautiful frontends and complex backend. In my spare time I usually can be found in a theme park, practicing card magic, watching a movie or tv show, or I'm programming.

projects_overview_projects.title: PHPValidation
projects_overview_projects.short_description: A simple validation library that allows you to write custom, laravel-like, validators for your data.

projects_overview_projects.title: PHPClassMapper
projects_overview_projects.short_description: A simple package that provides you with a simple class and array mapping system.

projects_overview_projects.title: PHPAbstractRouter
projects_overview_projects.short_description: A simple package that provides you with a framework agnostic router.
